lines.text: Hush little baby, don't say a word, mama's gonna buy you a mocking bird, and if that mocking bird don't sing... I'm gonna rip off his feathers and tear off his wings!
If he's the best man, why isn't she marrying him?
Hey Bob-O. You know what time it is?
Gee golly Bobby don't you know?
I thought only boys had tentacles.
